title: Deploy application to production

requirements.text: Deploy the current draft Version 30 of the Mortgage Tracker application to production
acceptanceCriteria: Version 30 is successfully deployed to the production Internet Computer network
The production deployment is accessible and serving users
All backend canisters are upgraded to the latest code
Frontend assets are deployed and accessible via the production URL

constraints: Use the existing draft Version 30 code without modifications
Preserve all existing user data and state during deployment
Ensure backend migration maintains data integrity
nonGoals: Making code changes or new features
